siteMetadata.name: Bryan Morgan
siteMetadata.title: Bryan Morgan | Engineering Manager / ML Engineer
siteMetadata.about: I believe everyone should be passionate about their work, always striving to do better and be better. With my background, I understand the multidimensional aspects of data and development, fostering collaboration and helping drive innovation excellence. As the digital and real worlds become even more closely connected, we need elegant solutions that enhance life...not complicate it. This is the challenge I am focused on solving.

projects.name: InferKnow
projects.description: Provide California's Emergency Coordinators with the Best Information to Quickly Save Lives and Property.

projects.name: Yoda
projects.description: A privacy-preserving solution that facilitates virtual guided yoga practice. Trained and running inference on the edge.

projects.name: Supporting Nature Conservancy w/ Computer Vision
projects.description: Automatically classify fish from on-ship cameras to support sustainable fishing practices and automate fish catch documentation.

projects.name: LinkedIn Experiment
projects.description: Does your photo matter on LinkedIn? Evaluating the impact of images in LinkedIn profile interest.

projects.name: Hydrobase
projects.description: Low cost Hydroponic grow system to support urban agriculture.

experience.name: Amazon
experience.description: Leader for Data Application at Amazon Air Business Intelligence. Led the design and implementation of a new organization-wide decision support platform, on a new stack. Prior to Air, Sr. TPM for Amazon Business, I led 6 cross functional teams to develop an enterprise procurement platform with integrated tax & legal solutions, processing $400M in 6m.
experience.firstDetail: This is going to be a better approach!

experience.name: PlayStation
experience.jobTitle: DATA SCIENCE MANAGER -- SR. DATA SCIENTIST -- SR. TPM
experience.description: Data Science Manager for Product Data Science, managing the collaboration between product, business and data science. Main responsibilities were problem development, exploratory data analysis and experimentation design + analysis. Prior to that, PO of application performance, working across all client engineering teams. While simultaneously, Sr. Data Scientist for Performance team, focusing on statistical analysis and forecasting for client applications. Focusing on predictive analytics, my models were required to deploy complex new systems while maintaining excellent performance. Initially, PO for Music on console, driving solutions across geographies and companies. Working with a diverse group of stakeholders, I developed new and innovative features that seamlessly integrated music with gaming experiences.
experience.firstDetail: This is going to be a better approach!
